name: Fandomrune
description:
DISCLAIMER

Any character in this game is not owned by me,
credits goes to thier rightful owners.

Evil has risen once again. every fandom is at danger, do you got what it takes? fandomrune is a sequel to fandomtale that features media with fanbases with bad reputations. this game takes places in diffrent worlds of popular games like fnaf  mother 3 etc. like fandomtale its just a basic rpg maker fangame with scripts to make it more appealing. The world was once a peaceful place until a evil king called killer kamal wanted to end every bit of happyness resulting it to a entire war that costed millions of lives.  although it seems that peace was gonna be a relic of the past until 3 heros came to the lands of snow town. it wont be easy for them but with enough power will they even make it?   - A deep story -custom battle system -lots of easter eggs -memes -cringy lines - Challenging puzzles - sad, happy, and confusing endings and much more      Special thanks to -Yanfly (for battle scripts)  - Moghunter (for Weather scripts) - my followers for the support. tags  #fangame#fnaf#undertale#anime#stevenuniverse#starwars#minecraft#rpg#puzzle#action#OFF#furrys#fandom#sonic#deltarune #fnaf
